text.div:
Which date/time qualifier

CodeDescriptionDeutsch (German)Nederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
ANY Any date/time within a rangeAlle EreignisseElke datum/tijd binnen periodedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
CAN Cancellation date/timeStornierungAnnulering datum/tijddeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.3
COL Collection date/time, equivalent to film or sample collection date/timeProbenentnahme / UntersuchungVerzamel datum/tijd (equivalent aan film of monster verzamel datum/tijd)deprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
ORD Order date/timeAuftragseingabeAanvraag datum/tijddeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
RCT Specimen receipt date/time, receipt of specimen in filling ancillary (Lab)ProbeneingangMonster ontvangen datum/tijd (ontvangst van monster bij filler (lab))deprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
REP Report date/time, report date/time at filling ancillary (i.e., Lab)BerichtserstellungVerslag datum/tijd (verslag datum/tijd bij filler (lab))deprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
SCHED Schedule date/timeTerminvergabePlanning datum/tijddeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6

name: v2 Which date/time qualifier
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0156 ( Which date/time qualifier)

property.description: The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged

concept.display: Collection date/time, equivalent to film or sample collection date/time

designation.value: Verzamel datum/tijd (equivalent aan film of monster verzamel datum/tijd)

concept.display: Specimen receipt date/time, receipt of specimen in filling ancillary (Lab)

designation.value: Monster ontvangen datum/tijd (ontvangst van monster bij filler (lab))

concept.display: Report date/time, report date/time at filling ancillary (i.e., Lab)
